content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

About Us

Your Local Computer Specialist Servicing

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Computer Repair is dedicated to providing the best customer service and computer repair available to you. When your Laptop, PC or Mac needs repairing, you won’t have to worry for long! Our technicians are skilled in dealing with all computers and gadgets whether you need home or business computer repairs.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”home-about-list”][vc_column width=”1/12″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”5/12″][vc_column_text css_animation=”none”]

  • Microsoft Windows PC Computer Repair
  • Apple iMac and Macbook Computer Repair
  • Data Recovery
  • Viruses, Malware, Adware and Ransom-ware Removal
  • Cracked and Broken Laptop Screen Replacements

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/12″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”5/12″][vc_column_text css_animation=”none”]

  • Microsoft Windows PC Computer Repair
  • Apple iMac and Macbook Computer Repair
  • Data Recovery
  • Viruses, Malware, Adware and Ransom-ware Removal
  • Cracked and Broken Laptop Screen Replacements

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1494303216291{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 80px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Our Advantages

[/vc_column_text]

Any Place
Any Screen Size
Quality Parts Only
7 Days a Week
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces”][vc_column]

We Specialize In

Our field of activity includes these areas

PC Repair
Problem PC? We’ll solve it. We’re who you call when your desktop runs slow and your programs stop working.
Mac Repair
Our Mac repair service offers high-quality repairs and advice: without the premium price.
Data Backup & Recovery
We can help you back up your important personal data (photos, videos, documents, school work, etc.) to disk and cloud with no hassles.
Network / Servers
Our technicians can set up a secure wireless network in your home that will allow you to share everything between as many computers
Malware and Virus Removal
Through years of experience we can remove the infestation without destroying your data.
Laptop Repair
Laptop gone down? Don’t worry! Our qualified, friendly laptop repair technicians will bring it back to life.
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1529909091180{background-image: url(http://smartdata.tonytemplates.com/computer-repairs/cellphonefix/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2017/03/block-bg-1-2.jpg?id=24) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”block round-services-txt fixed-bg-parallex” el_id=”counterBlock”][vc_column el_class=”block bg-1 network-effect”][vc_raw_html]JTNDY2FudmFzJTIwaWQlM0QlMjJuZXR3b3JrJTIyJTIwd2lkdGglM0QlMjIxOTIwJTIyJTIwaGVpZ2h0JTNEJTIyNjUwJTIyJTNFJTNDJTJGY2FudmFzJTNF[/vc_raw_html][vc_column_text]

All Computer & Tablet Services

We can Solve your Hardware and Software Problems

[/vc_column_text]

8000 +

Computer/Tablet/Laptop Is Repaired Properly

5 Hours

Average Resolution Time Per Support Request

10 Years

We've Strong Experience of Computer Repair

25000 +

We've Removed Virus & Spyware successfully

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1517306350322{border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-color: #e8e8e8 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1517306518646{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Meet Our Engineers

We are experts in repair and upgrading of Computers, Laptops, and Cell Phones

[/vc_column_text]

Michael Murray

Data recovery specialist

Kristopher Bunn

Mac & PC specialist

Kevin Berke

Laptop repairs, network, IT support

Barbara Hamby

Data recovery specialist
[vc_empty_space height=”90px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”home-ab-txt”][vc_column css_animation=”slideInLeft” width=”1/2″][vc_column_text css_animation=”none”]

No Fix – No Fee Guarantee

If we can’t fix your computer then you don’t owe us a penny!

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”4/12″][vc_single_image image=”22″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”8/12″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1517305942209{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]Whether your computer is running unbearably slow or won’t turn on at all, bring your computer to us today for all your computer repair needs. The expert technicians at Computer Repair have the experience to tackle all common issues including issues with your operating system, water damage, hardware replacement, software problems and more.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”slideInRight” width=”1/2″][vc_column_text css_animation=”slideInRight”]

Honesty and Transparency

We promise delivering vital service and to deliver it perfectly

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”4/12″][vc_single_image image=”23″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”8/12″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1517305951082{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]It is our promise to the customer that all dealing is fair and transparent. Customer satisfaction and trust are such pillars built only through the perfect adhesive honesty and this makes us present all our business aspects openly to the client to let him take thorough look and decide for himself.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” css=”.vc_custom_1517464724851{margin-bottom: -92px !important;background-color: #f4f4f6 !important;}” el_class=”about-popup-btn block bg-light full-block”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1517305733436{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1517382481533{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Get Your Computer Fixed NOW!

+1-800-1234567

for one of our professional computer repair techs to help you with your Desktop, Laptop, Mac or other inquiry

[/vc_column_text]

Free Estimate

    Contact Us
    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”margin-bottom-less-35″][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1517465468917{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
